    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Concoction
    Concoctions can affect health and mana of the target at the same time and additionally cast any number of spells
    class 
    HealthPotion
    HealthPotions increase the consumer's mana
    class 
    MagicItem
    MagicItems are items that can cause magic effects on other objects.
    class 
    ManaPotion
    A ManaPotion provides mana to its consumer
    class 
    Potion
    A potion has a specific magic effect on its consumer
    class 
    Scroll
    A Scroll object contains a spell that can be read by someone.

    Wizard.inventory

    Methods in a12345678.change.to.your.matriculation.number with parameters of type Tradeable
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    Trader.addToInventory (Tradeable item)
    If item is null, an IllegalArgumentException must be thrown; if inventory capacity would be exceeded, return false.
    boolean
    Wizard.addToInventory (Tradeable item)
    Edd item to inventory if carryingCapacity is sufficient.
    boolean
    Trader.possesses (Tradeable item)
    If item is null an IllegalArgumentException must be thrown; returns true if this object possesses the item, false otherwise.
    boolean
    Wizard.possesses (Tradeable item)
    Return true, if the item is in the inventory, false otherwise
    boolean
    Trader.removeFromInventory (Tradeable item)
    If item is null, an IllegalArgumentException must be thrown; removes item from the inventory and returns true on success, false if removing the item failed.
    boolean
    Wizard.removeFromInventory (Tradeable item)
    Remove item from inventory.
    boolean
    Wizard.sellItem (Tradeable item, Trader target)
    If item or target is null, IllegalArgumentException has to be thrown; if wizard is dead (isDead), no action can be taken and false is returned; call purchase on the item with this as seller and target as buyer; return true, if purchase was called successfully (returned true), false otherwise.
    boolean
    Wizard.useItem (Tradeable item, MagicEffectRealization target)
    If item or target is null, IllegalArgumentException has to be thrown; if wizard is dead (isDead) no action can be taken and false is returned; if wizard does not possess the item, false is returned; call useOn on the item with parameter target as target; return true, if useOn was called.
